content: seam to the right of the collar when viewing sweater from the front pick up sts around the neckline as follows 10 sts down neckline 3 sts across center front bind-off 10 sts up neckline to shoulder seam 13 sts across back edge 36 sts distribute on three needles for working in the round break yarn and switch to cc round 1 k10 cdd k to end 34 sts round 2 p1 k1 x5 k2 p1 k1 around round 3 p1 k1 x4 p1 cdd p1 k1 p1 to last st 32 sts bobble weave in ends and block sweater flight 1 by ouisi hamilton for chattanooga yarncrafters page # 12 special techniques kfb increase video tutorial from tin can knits https //youtu be/yeno-xu0ows m1l increase and m1r increase video tutorial from sheep & stitch https //youtu be/lsjnda4lzr8 k2tog decrease video tutorial from tin can knits https //youtu be/0xr722oa5hm ssk decrease video tutorial from tin can knits https //youtu be/73maytt4dns centered double decrease video tutorial from suzanne bryan https //youtu be/9obqljfcxry mattress stitch video tutorial from very pink knits https //youtu be/46iuyefckxa binding off in pattern video tutorial from very pink knits https //youtu be/blnnmlp_eum binding off in the middle of a row video tutorial from very pink knits https //youtu be/6xiv5w1xxpa three-needle bind off video tutorial from purl soho https //youtu be/4wgsokiw9p8 backwards loop cast on photo tutorial from knit picks https //www knitpicks com/learning-center/backwards-loop-cast-on picking up stitches at cast-on edge crew neck video tutorial from the blue mouse knits https //youtu be/ehbp11wg9k0 picking up stitches at neck scoop neck and v neck video tutorial from cheryl brunette https //youtu be/tv5uq-w8wmq picking up stitches along sides drop shoulder video tutorial from cheryl brunette https //youtu be/sgm7xtzt54e tidy underarms in top-down sweaters raglan video tutorial from roxanne richardson https //youtu be/7d3od5g5h1o
